prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Piano, Bass, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features Drums, Piano, and Bass, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This composition has Drums, Piano, and Bass, but Pipe is absent.

Style 3:
No Pipe is included in this song, but it does have Drums, Piano, and Bass.
